channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M60
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M60

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M60 clockwise between J5 and J6 | Clockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M60 clockwise between junctions J5 and J6, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M60 anti-clockwise between J23 and J22 | AntiClockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M60 anti-clockwise between junctions J23 and J18, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M60 anti-clockwise between J6 and J5 | AntiClockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M60 anti-clockwise between junctions J6 and J5, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M60 clockwise between J18 and J19 | Clockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M60 clockwise between junctions J18 and J23, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.title: M60 anti-clockwise between J13 and J12 | AntiClockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M60 anti-clockwise between junctions J13 and J12, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M60 J7 clockwise exit | Clockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M60 clockwise exit slip at junction J7 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks , from 3:30 pm on 8 October 2011 to 5 pm on 8 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M60 J9 anti-clockwise exit | AntiClockwise | Sports Event
item.description: On the M60 anti-clockwise exit slip at junction J9 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to a sports event , from 3:30 pm on 8 October 2011 to 5 pm on 8 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M60 J7 anti-clockwise access | AntiClockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M60 anti-clockwise entry slip at junction J7 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks , from 9 pm on 8 October 2011 to 11:30 pm on 8 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M60 J9 clockwise access | Clockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M60 clockwise entry slip at junction J9 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks , from 9 pm on 8 October 2011 to 11:30 pm on 8 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M60 J21 clockwise access | Clockwise | Roadworks
item.description: The M60 clockwise entry slip at junction J21 is closed , due to roadworks. Road expected to re-open from 5:00 am on 3 October 2011.

item.title: M60 J21 anti-clockwise access | AntiClockwise | Roadworks
item.description: The M60 anti-clockwise entry slip at junction J21 is closed , due to roadworks. Road expected to re-open from 5:00 am on 3 October 2011.

item.title: M60 J3 anti-clockwise exit | AntiClockwise | Roadworks
item.description: The M60 anti-clockwise exit slip at junction J3 will be closed due to roadworks, from 10 pm on 5 October 2011 to 5 am on 6 October 2011.

item.description: The M60 anti-clockwise entry slip at junction J12 will be closed due to roadworks, from 10 pm on 5 October 2011 to 5:30 am on 6 October 2011.

item.description: On the M60 anti-clockwise between junctions J5 and J4, expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks , between 10 pm and 5 am, from 3 October 2011 to 5 October 2011.

item.title: M60 anti-clockwise between J23 and J22 | AntiClockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M60 anti-clockwise between junctions J23 and J19, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 5:00 am on 28 February 2013.
